document.text:
From: ' 
< 
To: Druyan law < 
Subject: RE: US v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Date: Thu, 13 May 2021 03:17:57 +0000 
Hi Martin, 
As an update to this, the Court has issued a scheduling order for the trial. Jury selection will occur during the week of 
November 15th, and the trial will begin on November 29th. 
Thanks, 
From: Druyan 
law < 
Sent: Tuesday, May 4, 2021 1:39 PM 
To: 
Subject: Re: US v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Yes, thanks, 
I read of your exploits in the Times. 
Good luck 
MD 
Sent from my iPhone 
On May 4, 2021, at 10:06 AM, 
Martin, 
wrote: 
I hope all is well. We wanted to let you know that the Court has adjourned the trial date to the fall of 2021. We will 
update you when we have more information. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 Saint Andrews Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00019219
